title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Sept. 22
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Sept. 22
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Finish Line (FINL). Finish Line Inc.'s shares are headed for their biggest daily gain in 15 months in response to an optimistic profit outlook. The athletic-wear retailer said it expects fourth-quarter gross margin, or profit after merchandise costs, to rise from a year earlier. Analysts expected gross margin to be unchanged, based on the average estimate in a Bloomberg survey.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
